column1: Sam Grant: The Civil War in the West 1862-1864

Sam Grant covers the western theater of the American Civil War around the Mississippi area from 1862-1864.  It comes with a beautiful card-stock map from Vicksburg to Cincinnati and heaps of wooden blocks for the North and South.  The game utilizes both a strategic layer of the conflict but also provides a slightly more tactical layer of combat with additional battle maps that allow for center, and flank positions of specific units. Bobby Lee: The Civil War in Virginia 1861-1865, Bobby Lee: The Civil War in Virginia 1861-1865
Components: Block Wargames, Players: Two-Player Only Games
